item.title: By: Craftsman C3 Impact Wrench | Grand Mighty

item.description: [...] impact wrench from the local Sears for around $100. To put this into perspective, one of my Snap-on ratchets costs as much. Initially, I wanted to get a Makita unit, but it was too expensive. I’m only a [...]

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2012/08/where-dreams-are-built/#comment-26246">Kent</a>.
Thanks man, I'm excited to put this garage to use. Good luck with yours, clean and orderly is the way.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Kent.

Thanks man, I’m excited to put this garage to use. Good luck with yours, clean and orderly is the way.

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: Inspiring. I need to get the tools and garage clean like that one day.
item.content:encoded: Inspiring. I need to get the tools and garage clean like that one day.
